description: Gets the real-time active user data from the specified Amazon Connect instance.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filters to apply to returned user data. You can filter up to the following limits: Queues: 100 Routing profiles: 100 Agents: 100 Contact states: 9 User hierarchy groups: 1 The user data is retrieved for only the specified values/resources in the filter. A maximum of one filter can be passed from queues, routing profiles, agents, and user hierarchy groups. Currently tagging is only supported on the resources that are passed in the filter. Queues (list) --- A list of up to 100 queues or ARNs. (string) --- ContactFilter (dict) --- A filter for the user data based on the contact information that is associated to the user. It contains a list of contact states. ContactStates (list) --- A list of up to 9 contact states. (string) --- RoutingProfiles (list) --- A list of up to 100 routing profile IDs or ARNs. (string) --- Agents (list) --- A list of up to 100 agent IDs or ARNs. (string) --- UserHierarchyGroups (list) --- A UserHierarchyGroup ID or ARN. (string) ---

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.

nested_items.name: UserDataList
nested_items.description: A list of the user data that is returned.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the user.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the user.

nested_items.name: RoutingProfile
nested_items.description: Information about the routing profile that is assigned to the user.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the routing profile.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the routing profile.

nested_items.name: HierarchyPath
nested_items.description: Contains information about the levels of a hierarchy group assigned to a user.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the hierarchy group.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the hierarchy group.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the hierarchy group.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the hierarchy group.

nested_items.name: LevelThree
nested_items.description: Information about level three.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the hierarchy group.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the hierarchy group.

nested_items.name: LevelFour
nested_items.description: Information about level four.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the hierarchy group.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the hierarchy group.

nested_items.name: LevelFive
nested_items.description: Information about level five.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the hierarchy group.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the hierarchy group.

nested_items.name: StatusStartTimestamp
nested_items.description: The start timestamp of the agent's status.

nested_items.name: StatusArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the agent's status.

nested_items.name: StatusName
nested_items.description: The name of the agent status.

nested_items.name: AvailableSlotsByChannel
nested_items.description: A map of available slots by channel. The key is a channel name. The value is an integer: the available number of slots.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: MaxSlotsByChannel
nested_items.description: A map of maximum slots by channel. The key is a channel name. The value is an integer: the maximum number of slots. This is calculated from MediaConcurrency of the RoutingProfile assigned to the agent.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: ActiveSlotsByChannel
nested_items.description: A map of active slots by channel. The key is a channel name. The value is an integer: the number of active slots.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: Contacts
nested_items.description: A list of contact reference information.

nested_items.name: ContactId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the contact in this instance of Amazon Connect.

nested_items.name: Channel
nested_items.description: The channel of the contact.

nested_items.name: InitiationMethod
nested_items.description: How the contact was initiated.

nested_items.name: AgentContactState
nested_items.description: The state of the contact.

nested_items.name: StateStartTimestamp
nested_items.description: The epoch timestamp when the contact state started.

nested_items.name: ConnectedToAgentTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the contact was connected to an agent.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the queue.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the queue.

nested_items.name: NextStatus
nested_items.description: The Next status of the agent.

nested_items.name: ApproximateTotalCount
nested_items.description: The total count of the result, regardless of the current page size.
